ITEMDESC_BluntArrow: A well-aimed headknock will knock over any opponent.
ITEMDESC_Body_AssMage: A scary appearance, be it the dark design of the armor or the mage, who wears it.
ITEMDESC_Body_AssNovice: The armor consists of dark snapper leather and was manufactured by local hunters.
ITEMDESC_Body_AssWarrior: The fighter armor consists of hardened snapper leather and shoulder straps, in which blades can easy ensnare.
ITEMDESC_Body_Druid: The traditional robe of the druids, made only with natural materials.
ITEMDESC_Body_Firemage: The robe of the fire mages is very well suited for the living in Nordmar.
ITEMDESC_Body_KingGuard: The armor of the king's guards.
ITEMDESC_Body_King: The armor of the king of Myrtana.
ITEMDESC_Body_King_02: The armor of the king of Myrtana.
ITEMDESC_Body_Leather: This outfit made by hunters offers rather protection against the nature than against weapons, but is very comfortable.
ITEMDESC_Body_MercElite: The mercenaries make use of the assault armor of Myrtana for their own purposes.
ITEMDESC_Body_Mercenary: The army armor was revamped and now offers also protection for the legs and an improved neckguard.
ITEMDESC_Body_MercNovice: It consists admittedly only of cloth and leather, but is processed rugged to offer protection in a fight.
ITEMDESC_Body_Merc_Orcish: Only those well-respected by the orcs may wear this armor.
ITEMDESC_Body_NomadNovice: The dress with advantageous in the desert protects against hot sun beams.
ITEMDESC_Body_Nomad: The nomads' tribal garb is very traditional, light showy clothes cover a robust armor.
ITEMDESC_Body_NomadWarrior: The supreme nomad warriors wear the superb armor, made of refractory leather.
ITEMDESC_Body_NrdElite: The centuries-old design of this armor is timeless - a real classic.
ITEMDESC_Body_NrdScout: Is primarily worn by huntsman and keeps the wearer warm even for days.
ITEMDESC_Body_NrdWarrior: The warrior armor is marvellous heavy plated and fends off not only coldness but also onslaughts.
ITEMDESC_Body_Paladin: Wearing this full metal paladin armor tags a true warrior.
ITEMDESC_Body_Peasant: The clothes of a Myrtanian farmer.
ITEMDESC_Body_Player: You could also fight equally in the nude.
ITEMDESC_Body_Ranger: The clothes were perfected for the hunt in the deep woods of Myrtana.
ITEMDESC_Body_RebBandit: A military scout armor, which is used further in the ranks of the rebels.
ITEMDESC_Body_RebElite: The Myrtanian assault armor features not only with steady quality, but also with good design.
ITEMDESC_Body_RebWarrior: It is the former standard army armor and offers primarily body protection.
ITEMDESC_Body_Watermage: The traditional robe of the water mages.
ITEMDESC_Body_Xardas: Only few people wear Xardas' robe. Black mages are very rare these days.
ITEMDESC_Body_Zuben: The armor of the lord of Varant is worn by nobody lesser than Zuben himself.
ITEMDESC_It_Ali_Artefact: Ali stole this ancestor stone in Nordmar. It belongs to the grave of a certain Ejnar.
FO_It_AlShedim_Deadkeeper_01: Urn of the guardians of the dead
ITEMDESC_It_AlShedim_TempleKey_01: For the temple of Al Shedim.
ITEMDESC_It_AlShedim_TempleKey_02: For the temple of Al Shedim.
ITEMDESC_It_AlShedim_TempleKey_03: For the temple of Al Shedim.
ITEMDESC_It_AlShedim_TempleKey_04: For the temple of Al Shedim.
ITEMDESC_It_AlShedim_TempleKey_05: For the temple of Al Shedim.
ITEMDESC_It_Armor_Rhobar: The armor of the king of Myrtana.
ITEMDESC_It_Armor_RoyalGuard: The armor of the king's guard.
ITEMDESC_It_Artefact_Crown: One of the artefacts of Adanos.
ITEMDESC_It_Artefact_Helmet_Geldern: Since this time the typical paladin helmet has further developed massively. A desired collectible.
ITEMDESC_It_Artefact_Ring_Geldern: You can see how old it is.
ITEMDESC_It_Artefact_Ring_01: One of the artefacts of Adanos.
ITEMDESC_It_Artefact_Ring_02: One of the artefacts of Adanos.
ITEMDESC_It_Artefact_Robe: It is made of heavy cloth.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_BarbarianAxe_01: Even an orc would be afraid of this weapon.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_Bardiche_01: The downward pulled axe blade gives the axe its name.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_BattleAxe_01: The weapon penetrates armors and helmets with its sharpened blade without difficulty.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_BerserkerAxe_01: The sight is simply enough to bring enemies to fear and terror.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_BerserkerRageAxe_01: Truly a masterpiece of handicraft. The blade has recesses to reduce the weight of the axe.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_HeavyClub_01: A weapon of nature. Too heavy to use it one-handed.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_NailedClub_01: A cudgel, prepared with a head full of nails.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_OgreMorningStar_01: That is no morningstar. But explain that to an ogre.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_OrcSword_01: This raw forged sword has a corrugated sharpening to cause even bigger wounds.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_OrcSword_02: The double-edged version of the Krush Varok, with which you can chop swaths into the lines of the enemy.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_OrcWaraxe_01: The orc axe has a corrugated axe blade to tear even bigger wounds.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_Orc_01: The Krush Pach is the incarnation of an orc axe.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_Rust_01: The axe has laid too long in the great outdoors to be of any use.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_SpikedClub_01: An improved version of the spiked cudgel with metal thorns instead of nails.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_Stormcaller_01: The icecold wind from Nordmar accompanies the bearer of this axe.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_Waraxe_01: The axe has two blades to maximize the damage by swinging.
ITEMDESC_It_Axe_Warhammer_01: A dreadful weapon with which you can dent heavy armors, break bones and smash skulls.
ITEMDESC_It_BlackTroll_Horn: Massive horn of a powerful troll.
ITEMDESC_It_Bloodfly_Sting: The stinger of a nerving giant insect.
ITEMDESC_It_Boar_Tusk: There were times when boars were frightened.
ITEMDESC_It_Book_INT_01: Knowledge from the long forgotten past.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Army: An improved version of the longbow with special strengthening.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Bone: This special bow was made of flexible animal bones.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Composite: A bow constructed from several materials, thus a higher tension is obtained.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Deathbringer: The bow has a system of rollers, which boosts the tension and relieves the archer's arm.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Demon: They say the souls of its victims carry the arrows to the target.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Fight: The compact battle bow is used by soldiers to decimate enemy lines fast.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Horn: The horn bow is a special composite bow with horn as base material.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Hunting: By hunters improved version of the normal bow.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Long: The bow has a larger length than other bows, thus arrows can be shot up a long range.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Masterbow: Made by a master, from the most durable wood.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Oak: Made from the heartwood of an oak.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_OrcRipper: Only in Nordmar do they 'hunt' for orcs.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Ranger: The experience of the rangers is in this bow which is suited especially for big game hunting.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_Rune: The runes give the bow its power.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_SilentDeath: The handling demands much skill, but lets the arrows fly far, so that one cannot hear the incoming death.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_War: A compact bow, which was constructed to combat armored enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Bow_WolfRipper: Especially for the game hunt designed bow.
ITEMDESC_It_Claw: An edged claw. Typical animal trophy.
ITEMDESC_It_Cookie: Would you like some wine with your cookie?
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_BloodHarvest: The crossbow consists of yew wood and owes its name to the red-brown color of the lumber.
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_Bounty: A compact crossbow, which you can carry with you effortlessly even for a longer time.
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_KrashMorra: The best crossbow at all was constructed by orcs and has driven fear into the hearts of humankind.
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_Merc: Is preferred by the orc mercenaries. The reload is simplified by the stirrup ahead.
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_Nrd: The hunting skilled Nordmarians created this incarnation of a crossbow.
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_Orc: The orcish version of a normal crossbow.
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_Penetration: Hard on impact – it goes straight through every armor.
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_Rhino: This crossbow is said to possibly kill a rhinoceros with a single shot.
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_SlaveKiller: The inglorious name is because escaping slaves were killed with it by their wardens.
ITEMDESC_It_Crossbow_War: Is used by the finest shooters of Myrtana to combat enemies already on long range.
ITEMDESC_It_Cup_Gold: A valuable chalice. Could have a high price for the thieves.
ITEMDESC_It_Cup_Horn: Drank from a drinking-horn mostly at soughing festivals. Of course honey beer.
ITEMDESC_It_Cup_Silver: Isn't as valuable as a gold chalice.
ITEMDESC_It_Dark_Snapper_Leather: Dark leather from a certain kind of snapper.
ITEMDESC_It_DruidStone_Lion: With this stone, the hero can transform into a lion.
ITEMDESC_It_DruidStone_Lurker: With this stone, the hero can transform into a lurker.
ITEMDESC_It_DruidStone_Ripper: With this stone, the hero can transform into a ripperbeast.
ITEMDESC_It_DruidStone_Shadowbeast: With this stone, the hero can transform into a shadowbeast.
ITEMDESC_It_DruidStone_Snapper: With this stone, the hero can transform into a snapper.
ITEMDESC_It_DruidStone_Waran: With this stone, the hero can transform into a lizard.
ITEMDESC_It_DruidStone_Wolf: With this stone, the hero can transform into a wolf.
ITEMDESC_It_Drum: Isn't as big as Orcish drums.
ITEMDESC_It_DrumStick: The right item to use a drum.
ITEMDESC_It_Ejnar_Helm: Ejnar wore this helmet during his fight against the orcs.
ITEMDESC_It_FiremageCup: The chalice is ancient, and decorated with symbols of Innos.
ITEMDESC_It_Firewaran_Leather: Lightly charred leather of a fire lizard.
ITEMDESC_It_GoldNugget: A large lump of gold. A lot of coins could be made from it.
ITEMDESC_It_Gold_Stack_01: Can't beat a loaded bag of gold.
ITEMDESC_It_Gold_Stack_02: Can't beat a loaded bag of gold.
ITEMDESC_It_Gold_Stack_03: Can't beat a loaded bag of gold.
ITEMDESC_It_Gold: You can't beat a well-full gold bag.
ITEMDESC_It_Halberd_Orc_01: The orcish model of a halberd. However you dash with it instead of jabbing.
ITEMDESC_It_Halberd_01: Guard- and defensive weapon of the humans.
ITEMDESC_It_IceGolem_Heart: Even if you say it is, your heart can't be this cold.
ITEMDESC_It_IceWolf_Fur: White fur of the Nordmarian wolves.
ITEMDESC_It_Iomar_Supply: Lamp oil is an undervalued treasure.
ITEMDESC_It_IronOre: Comes from an iron ore vein.
ITEMDESC_It_Jaffar_Weapons: A collection of different swords and blunt weapons.
ITEMDESC_It_Key_Ali: It belongs to Ali and seems to fit his chest.
ITEMDESC_It_Key_Lockpick: Useful if you lost your key or don't have your neighbor's key.
ITEMDESC_It_Key: You can open doors and chests with it.
ITEMDESC_It_Map_Ancestorgraves: The ancestor tombs of Nordmar are marked in this map.
ITEMDESC_It_Map_AncestorGraves: The cave tombs of the ancestors in Nordmar are shown on this map.
ITEMDESC_It_Map_SaturasTempleKeys: Saturas has marked the probable locations of the temple keys of Al Shedim on this map.
ITEMDESC_It_Map_World_Caves: A map with all of the caves.
ITEMDESC_It_Map_XardasExcavations: The major orc excavations are marked on this map.
ITEMDESC_It_MC_Mandibles: These mandibles were taken from the minecrawlers of Myrtana.
ITEMDESC_It_Meat_Raw: You can eat it. But it tastes better cooked.
ITEMDESC_It_MilkBarrel: Milk from a farm near Montera.
ITEMDESC_It_MoraSul_TempleKey_01: For the temple of Mora Sul.
ITEMDESC_It_MoraSul_TempleKey_02: For the temple of Mora Sul.
ITEMDESC_It_MoraSul_TempleKey_03: For the temple of Mora Sul.
ITEMDESC_It_MoraSul_TempleKey_04: For the temple of Mora Sul.
ITEMDESC_It_MoraSul_TempleKey_05: For the temple of Mora Sul.
ITEMDESC_It_OrcPipe: As if this pipe has brought freedom...
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Acrobatic: The hero receives less damage from falling. He cannot die from a fall.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Assassin: The hero can sneak up on an opponent from behind and kill him with a well-aimed stab.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Axe_1: The hero can wield large weapons, such as battle axes and two-handers, in combat.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Axe_2: The hero is a good fighter with large weapons.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Axe_3: The hero is a master of combat with large weapons.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Barter: The hero receives better prices when trading.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Bow_1: The hero is a capable archer.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Bow_2: The hero is a good archer.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Bow_3: The hero is a master archer.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Crossbow_1: The hero can use heavy crossbows in combat.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Crossbow_2: The hero is a good marksman with the heavy crossbow.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Crossbow_3: The hero is a master marksman with a heavy crossbow.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Darkmage: Spells of summoning magic become more effective. They deal almost double damage and last one and a half time as long as usual.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Druid: The duration of all transformations is doubled.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Excuse: If the hero is suspected of a crime, he can attempt to talk his way out of it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_ExplosiveArrow: All you need is an alchemist's bench, a formula, the ingredients, and the knowledge how to make it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_FireArrow: All you need is an alchemist's bench, a formula, the ingredients, and the knowledge how to make it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Firemage: Spells of dominance magic become more effective. They deal almost double damage and last one and a half time as long as usual.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_HeavyArmor: The hero receives an armor bonus on all armor.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Hunter_1: The hero does double bow damage to game animals, such as deer and wild boars.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Hunter_2: The hero does double bow damage to predators.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_ImmuneToDisease: The hero is immune against diseases.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_ImmuneToPoison: The hero is immune to all poisons.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_KnockOut: The hero can sneak up on an unsuspecting victim from behind, and knock it down with a club.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Learn: When going up a level, the hero receives an additional learning point.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_LightArmor: The armor protection of all robes is doubled.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_LockPick_1: The hero can pick simple locks with a lockpick.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_LockPick_2: The hero can even pick difficult locks with a lockpick.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_LockPick_3: The hero can actually pick impossible locks with a lockpick.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_MasterGladiator: The hero's body also heals wounds when not resting.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_MasterMage: The hero also regenerates his mana without resting.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_MasterThief: The hero can sneak up on his sleeping victim and rob it of everything.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Mining: The hero can prospect twice as effectively.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Orcslayer: The hero does additional close combat damage to orcs.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_OrcHunter: The hero does additional bow damage to orcs.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Paladin: The hero does additional damage to creatures of Beliar.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PickPocket_1: The hero is a skilled thief. He can perform simple pickpocketing.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PickPocket_2: The hero is a good thief. He can also perform difficult pickpocketing.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PickPocket_3: The hero is an excellent thief. He can even perform impossible pickpocketing.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PoisonArrow: All you need is an alchemist's bench, a formula, the ingredients, and the knowledge of how to make it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PoisonBlade: All you need is a blade, a bottle of poison, and the knowledge of how to use it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PotionHP: All you need is an alchemist's bench, a formula, the ingredients, and the knowledge of how to make it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PotionMP: All you need is an alchemist's bench, a formula, the ingredients, and the knowledge of how to make it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PotionPerm: All you need is an alchemist's bench, a formula, the ingredients, and the knowledge of how to make it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PotionPoison: All you need is an alchemist's bench, a formula, the ingredients, and the knowledge of how to make it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_PotionTransform: All you need is an alchemist's bench, a formula, the ingredients, and the knowledge of how to make it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_ResistCold: The hero is immune to the effects of great cold and receives an armor bonus against ice damage.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_ResistHeat: The hero is immune to the effect of great heat, and receives an armor bonus against fire damage.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_SharpArrow: All you need is an alchemist's bench, a formula, the ingredients, and the knowledge of how to make it.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_SharpenBlade: The hero can hone his weapons on a whetstone. A honed weapon does additional damage.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Shield_1: The hero can use shields in combat.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Shield_2: The hero loses less endurance when he parries with a shield.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Smith_1: The hero can forge normal weapons on an anvil. He needs a blueprint, the components, and a smith's hammer.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Smith_2: The hero can forge magic ore weapons on an anvil. He needs a blueprint, the components, and a smith's hammer.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Smith_3: The hero can forge pure ore weapons on an anvil. He needs a blueprint, the components, and a smith's hammer.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Sneak_2: The hero can sneak up on wild animals.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Sprinter: The hero can sprint for twice as long.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_StaffMagic: With a magic staff and magic in his hands, the hero can activate a barrier that deflects magic damage to his mana.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Staff_1: The hero can use staves in combat.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Staff_2: The hero is a good staff fighter.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Staff_3: The hero is a master staff fighter.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_TrophyTeeth: The hero can take the horns, claws, and teeth of animals.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_Watermage: Spells of transformation magic become more effective. They deal almost double damage and last one and a half time as long as usual.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_1H1H_1: The hero can use two one-handed weapons in battle.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_1H1H_2: The hero is a master of combat and receives new attack blows and extra damage.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_1H_1: The hero is a capable swordfighter.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_1H_2: The hero is a strong swordfighter.
ITEMDESC_It_Perk_1H_3: The hero is a master swordfighter.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_Adanosboost: When a warrior of Adanos falls, there is also a god mourning.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_Alligator: A white blossom with a red name.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_Beliarboost: Beliar destroys his enemies also through you.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_DEX_Snow: You can increase your dexterity permantly.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_DEX: You can increase your dexterity permantly.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_HealthPerm: Permanently increases the user's life force.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_HealthPerm_Snow: Permanently increases the user's life force.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_Innosboost: The fire, that keeps you warm.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_Perm_01: An essential ingredient for stronger potions.
ITEMDESC_It_Plant_Perm_01_Snow: An essential ingredient for stronger potions.
ITEMDESC_It_Pocket_Jack: Jack's wallet which contains hardly any gold.
ITEMDESC_It_PoisonBladder: This merchandise is in great demand in Varant.
ITEMDESC_It_Potion_DEX: This potion permanently increases the user's hunting skill.
ITEMDESC_It_Potion_Godspower: Unavailable for gold: the treasure of the gods.
ITEMDESC_It_Potion_HPMax: This potion permanently increases the user's life force.
ITEMDESC_It_Potion_MPMax: Permanently increases the user's magic power.
ITEMDESC_It_Potion_Poison: Never an ingredient of a healing potion.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Alligator: This potion transforms the user into a crocodile.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_AncestorMight: Blueprint for the Power of the Ancestors.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_AncestorSword: Blueprint for the Sword of the Ancestors.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Bison: This potion transforms the user into a bison.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Bloodfly: This potion transforms the user into a bloodfly.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Boar: This potion transforms the user into a boar.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_CureDisease: This potion heals all kinds of diseases.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_CurePoison: Antidote for any kind of poison.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_DEX: This potion gives the user permanent hunting skills.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_ElBastardo: Blueprint for the legendary El Bastardo.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_ExplosiveArrow: With this recipe and the necessary ingredients, our hero can make exploding arrows.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_FireArrow: With this recipe and the necessary ingredients, our hero can make fire arrows.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Firewaran: This potion transforms the user into a fire lizard.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_HPMax: Permanently increases the user's life force.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Lion: This potion transforms the user into a lion.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Lurker: This potion transforms the user into a lurker.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Meatbug: This potion transforms the user into a meatbug.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_NrdSword: Blueprint for a real Nordmarian sword.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_PoisonArrow: With this recipe and the necessary ingredients, our hero can make poison arrows.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Poison_1: The poison is extracted from a poison bladder.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Poison_2: The poison is extracted from lizard tongues.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Rhino: This potion transforms the user into a rhinoceros.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Sabertooth: This potion transforms the user into a sabertooth.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Scavenger: This potion transforms the user into a scavenger.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Shadowbeast: This potion transforms the user into a shadowbeast.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_SharpArrow: With this recipe and the necessary ingredients, our hero can make sharp arrows.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Snapper: This potion transforms the user into a snapper.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Stollengrollen: The strongest booze in the world.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_SwampLurker: This potion transforms the user into a swamp lurker.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Waran: This potion transforms the user into a lizard.
ITEMDESC_It_Recipe_Wolf: This potion transforms the user into a wolf.
ITEMDESC_It_Russel_Supply: They shouldn't leave it lying around.
ITEMDESC_It_Sabertooth_Fur: Fur of a sabertooth. A wonderful look.
ITEMDESC_It_Sabertooth_Tooth: A long, sharp fang of a sabertooth.
ITEMDESC_It_SanfordsRebList: The letter is addressed to Roland.
ITEMDESC_It_Saw: Woodcutters trusts a saw with ore coating.
ITEMDESC_It_Scavenger_Egg: You can see something in it if held up to the light.
ITEMDESC_It_Scoop: Without a decent ladle doesn't cook a delicious meals in the cauldron.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_AnimalForm: The hero transforms into the animal being aimed at.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_ArmyOfCuteness: Fear and fright spread among the army!
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_ArmyOfDarkness: The hero summons an army directly from Beliar's realm.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_BlessWeapon: A blessed weapon does more damage.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Bloodlust: The target falls into an uncontrolled frenzy of bloodlust. It will attack anything, friend or foe.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_CallAnimals: The mage sets the animals in his surroundings on the target.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_CureDisease: The hero strengthens his body. All disease effects are ended.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_DestroyEvil: The light of Innos shines and destroys the servants of Beliar.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Disease: The hero transfers a disease to his victims.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_DuskToDawn: Beliar grants the mage power of day and night. This magic only works at night.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Fear: The mage is surrounded by an aura of fear, which only the strongest enemies can withstand.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Firerain: Fires rains down and burns the enemies of Innos.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Flamesword: The fire that forged this blade has never died. In the name of Innos, it now kills his enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_FrostWave: Waves of ice spread out from the hero, damaging nearby enemies and freezing them.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Hailstorm: A thunderstorm rains down on the hero's enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Healing: The power of Innos closes all of the hero's wounds. His hit points are completely restored.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_HealOther: The hero completely heals the target.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_HeatWave: A ring of fire spreads out from the hero and burns his enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Hypnosis: The hero sends several targets around him into a deep sleep.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Charm: The target forgets all of the hero's crimes.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Icelance: A missile of ice, which harms your enemy. It also has a chance to freeze him too.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_INT_01: It almost falls apart when touched.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Light: Innos sent humans light to drive out the darkness of Beliar.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Lightningbolt: A lance made of pure energy.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Meteor: The hero calls Innos to slay one of his enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Mist: A bank of fog forms around the hero and protects him from the eyes of his enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Sleep: The hero sends his target into a deep sleep.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_SoulTravel: The mage frees his spirit from his body.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_SummonDemon: Beliar has many servants. Demons are among the most powerful.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_SummonGoblin: A goblin helps the hero in battle.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_SummonGolem: The hero summons a golem to help him in battle.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_SummonLightning: The conjurer calls the powers of nature to slay his enemy.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_SummonSkeleton: Beliar demands service even beyond death.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_TameAnimal: The targeted animal comes under the hero's control. It will follow him and help him in battle, if possible.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_Telekinesis: That which seemed unreachable is now at hand.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_TimeBubble: A time bubble in which time runs slower forms in front of the hero.
ITEMDESC_It_Scroll_WordOfControl: You must follow me, said Innos, and humans obeyed.
ITEMDESC_It_Shadowbeast_Fur: Dirty shadowbeast fur with some blood.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Knight_01: The symbols stand for the 4 main virtues of a knight: bravery, dignity, humility and loyalty.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Leather_01: The nomads in Varant rely on leather as base material for their light shields.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Paladin_01: The universal symbol of the paladins decorates the shield. All bearers are brothers in arms.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Round_01: The Nordmarian round shield is strapped with metal and the wood is strengthened with metal rails.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Rune_01: Unknown runes bear witness to the age of this shield.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Skull_01: The name is because this wooden shield looks like an upside down skull.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Wood_02: An old emblem shield which shows the royal heraldic animal - a shadow beast.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Wood_03: A common wooden shield which one can see uncommonly often in the claws of skeletons.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Wood_04: A tatty shield which presents the coat of arms of one paladin order.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Wood_06: The four diamonds on the shield represent the four-city league of Silden, Geldern, Montera and Trelis.
ITEMDESC_It_Shield_Wood_07: A character in the ancient human language is located on the front side which stands for shelter.
ITEMDESC_It_Shovel: Slaves know this item very well.
ITEMDESC_It_Snapper_Leather: Skin of a wide-spread kind of snapper.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_AnimalForm: The hero transforms into the animal being aimed at. The duration of this effect depends on the strength of the animal and the hero's ancient knowledge.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_ArmyOfDarkness: The hero summons an army directly from Beliar's realm. It will follow him and fight at his side in battle.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_BlessWeapon: A blessed weapon does more damage. The effect is permanent.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Bloodlust: The target falls into an uncontrolled frenzy of bloodlust. It will attack anything, friend or foe.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_CallAnimals: The hero sets nearby animals on the target.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_CureDisease: The hero strengthens his body. All disease effects are ended.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_DestroyEvil: The light of Innos shines and destroys the servants of Beliar. The effect depends on the strength of the opponent and the hero's ancient knowledge.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Disease: The hero transfers a disease to his victims.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_DuskToDawn: Beliar grants the mage power of day and night. The time until the next dawn passes swiftly, and the hero feels as though he had rested during all the time which has passed. This magic only works at night.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Fear: The mage is surrounded by an aura of fear, which only the strongest enemies can withstand.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Firerain: Fire rains down and burns the enemies of Innos.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Flamesword: The fire that forged this blade has never died. In the name of Innos, it now kills his enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_FrostWave: Waves of ice spread out from the hero, damaging nearby enemies and freezing them.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Hailstorm: A thunderstorm rains down on the hero's enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Healing: The power of Innos closes all of the hero's wounds. His hit points are completely restored.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_HealOther: The hero heals the target completely.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_HeatWave: A ring of fire spreads out from the hero and burns his enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Charm: The target forgets all of the hero's crimes.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_IceBomb: The hero shoots ice arrows in all directions, damaging his enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Light: Innos sent humans light to drive out the darkness of Beliar.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Lightningbolt: A lance made of pure energy.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Meteor: The hero calls Innos to slay one of his enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Mist: A standing bank of fog forms around the hero and protects him from the eyes of his enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Sleep: The hero sends the target into a deep sleep. The duration of this sleep depends on the strength of the target and the hero's ancient knowledge.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_SoulTravel: The mage frees his spirit from his body. His spirit can wander unseen among enemies.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_SummonDemon: Beliar has many servants. Demons are among the most powerful.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_SummonGoblin: A goblin supports the hero in battle.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_SummonGolem: The hero summons a golem to help him in battle.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_SummonLightning: The conjurer calls the powers of Beliar to slay an enemy.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_SummonSkeleton: Beliar demands service even beyond death.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_TameAnimal: The targeted animal comes under the hero's control. It will follow him and support him in battle.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_Telekinesis: That which seemed unreachable is now at hand.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_TimeBubble: A time bubble in which time runs slower forms in front of the hero.
ITEMDESC_It_Spell_WordOfControl: You must follow me, said Innos, and humans obeyed.
ITEMDESC_It_Staff_BladeStaff_01: Two blades make it a fearsome weapon.
ITEMDESC_It_Staff_JudgementStaff_01: The staff is the symbol of judges, but can also be used to judge conflicts.
ITEMDESC_It_Staff_Quarterstaff_01: Novices of Innos practice the handling of this staff. Both ends are strengthened with metal.
ITEMDESC_It_Staff_Scythe_01: This tool better belongs in the hands of a farmer.
ITEMDESC_It_Staff_Spear_01: One of the oldest weapons of all, nevertheless the spear is continuously used for hunting and warfare.
ITEMDESC_It_Stoneplate_INT_02: The writing can hardly be read.
ITEMDESC_It_Sulfur: Sulfur is an essential element for living beings and alchemists. Especially for alchemists.
ITEMDESC_It_SuperWine: Would you like a cookie with your wine?
ITEMDESC_It_Swamplurker_PoisonBladder: This merchandise is in great demand in Varant.
ITEMDESC_It_Sword_PureOre: Pure ore weapons can be made with this.
ITEMDESC_It_Sword_RawOre: This can be used to make magic ore weapons.
ITEMDESC_It_Teleport_Beliar: Teleport to the great temple of Beliar in Bakaresh.
ITEMDESC_It_Teleport_Innos: Teleport to the Innos shrine in the monastery.
ITEMDESC_It_Teleport_King: Teleport directly to the throne room of King Rhobar II.
ITEMDESC_It_Teleport_LeaveVangard: No one knows where it goes.
ITEMDESC_It_Teleport_VangardTempel: Teleport to the temple of Vengard.
ITEMDESC_It_Torch_Burning: It will show you the way in the dark.
ITEMDESC_It_Torch: This torch will not help you anymore.
ITEMDESC_It_Troll_Fur: It is valuable and you'll get fame. But the Troll won't be very happy.
ITEMDESC_It_Waran_Leather: Wide-spread leather skin of a lizard.
ITEMDESC_It_Waran_Tongue: The tongue of a lizard. Don't eat it.
ITEMDESC_It_Wine: Harmonically, well-aged, a little bit furry, long movement.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_AncestorSword_01: This powerful weapon is made of pure magic ore.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_AssDagger_01: Easy to hide under clothes, this dagger is useful for assassinations.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_AssSword_01: The poisoned blade helps to shorten exhausting fights in the hot desert sun.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_BarbarianSword_01: A raw forged blade with dull sharpening, which is wield more like an axe than a sword.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Bastardsword_01: The sword is a mix of one-hander and two-hander with extended hilt.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Broadsword_01: The blade is neither too short nor too long, a perfect weapon for beginners and advanced fighters.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Crescent_01: This noble blade was forged by a true master.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Epee_01: An elegant weapon that requires great skill.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_FingersRapier_01: The symbol of a true master thief. Many would kill to get their hands on this sword.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_FlameSword_01: The sword Innos, which hurts with steel and burns with flame.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_GreatSword_01: Only the strongest fighters can wield this sword.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Iceblade_01: The origin of the blade is not proven, they suppose a sword master of Adanos as creator.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Ingvar_Sword: Such swords are made only in Nordmar.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Inquisitor_01: Is used by believers of Innos in battle against heretics.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Katana_01: The Katana unites length and lightweight design in one razor sharp blade.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Longsword_01: For an one-handed sword it offers perfect blade length.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_MasterSword_01: A masterpiece of Varantish metal forging with severe sharpening and sharp end.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Moonblade_01: A mysterious aura surrounds this blade.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_OrcSlayer_01: The preferred weapon of the rebels, specially designed for the orc war.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_PaladinSword_01: Once, only paladins were allowed to wield such a weapon.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Runesword_01: Ancient runes give this weapon its power.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Scimitar_01: The Varantish version of the headsman's sword.
ITEMDESC_It_1H_Sword_Rust_01: This sword has seen better days.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_AncestorMight_01: A powerful weapon of pure ore.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_Axe_Lumberjack: Even this tool is used as battle weapon.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_Bak-Arash_Staff: This staff belonged to a necromancer.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_DemonSword_01: Only a madman would pay gold for this sword.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_Executioner_01: This sharp executioner's sword is used to decapitate convicts.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_GreatInquisitor_01: The two-handed version of the Inquisitor. This weapon is wield by supreme paladins.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_InnosWrath_01: No one knows where this weapon came from.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_OrderSword_01: The two-handed design of the paladin sword.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_Sword_Ore_01: Magical ore and Nordmarian metal forging unite in one mighty two-hander.
ITEMDESC_It_2H_Sword_Rust_01: The weapon is past it's sell-by date, but is still used by the lower class.
ITEMDESC_Kalans_Hammer: It belongs to the ore smelter Kalan.
ITEMDESC_TrollFist: You'd clearly have a problem if this thing hit you.
